question: If I start with a certain plan can I upgrade?
ans: Absolutely! Any time, just go to the Organization settings tab (in the SaleAssist panel) and click on the upgrade button

question: What happens if I cancel?
ans: You may cancel your subscription any time by going to the SaleAssist dashboard Organization settings and cancel. Your next month billing wont happen post cancellation.

question: What if I have multiple websites?
ans: No problem, in standard & pro plan, there is no limit to how many websites you integrate.

question: How many widgets, buttons, QR code etc i can generate?
ans: In standard & pro plan, there is no limit to how many widgets/buttons/QR you generate

question: Is there any limit to number of conversations, or duration of conversations?
ans: No there is no limit to number of conversations or duration of conversations in any of the plan.

question: How many members can use the platform?
ans: In starter plan , you have 1 member limit. In Standard, 5 members can use and in Pro, 30 members can use.

question: Do you do custom feature development?
ans: Yes. We have an open API and a Professional Services Team that loves to create custom solutions. This is applicable to Enterprise level clients.
